name: Philippa
newsAbout: Philippa leads the press team with confidence and grace. Her calm leadership, thoughtful decision-making, and commitment to teamwork make her a respected role model who inspires excellence in everyone around her.

name: Veronica
newsAbout: Veronica’s confident voice and cheerful spirit make her the heart of every broadcast. As Vice President, she supports the team with leadership and creativity, ensuring every project shines with professionalism and warmth.

name: Favour
newsAbout: Favour contributes meaningfully to local news coverage. Her dedication, reliability, and growing leadership skills make her a promising young journalist admired by her peers.

name: Patricia
newsAbout: Patricia beautifully combines creativity with organization in her dual role. She uplifts her peers with inspiring talks and manages the team’s finances with discipline and integrity, setting a strong example for others.

name: Elizabeth
newsAbout: Elizabeth blends her love for entertainment with impressive organizational skills. Her creative storytelling and dependable teamwork make her a valued member of the press team.

name: Bradley
newsAbout: Bradley leads the media team with vision and artistry. His creativity, professionalism, and storytelling talent set a high standard that continually elevates the team’s visual productions.

name: Nyamia
newsType: Vice Head of Media & Video Production
newsAbout: Nyamia plays an important role in keeping the media team organized and effective. His sense of responsibility and calm approach make him a dependable presence and a trusted teammate.

name: Lauren
newsAbout: Lauren brings creativity and technical skill to every project. As the designer and builder of the team’s official website, TypeShift, he has strengthened the press team’s digital presence and inspired innovation among his peers.

name: Rodney
newsAbout: Rodney’s curiosity and clear communication make him one of the most trusted voices on campus. His friendly approach and attention to detail reflect his genuine passion for storytelling.

name: Seriki
newsAbout: Seriki reports school updates with care and precision. Her approachable nature and commitment to accuracy make her a reliable and respected member of the press team.

name: Momoh
newsAbout: Momoh brings enthusiasm and insight to every sports report. His love for athletics and team spirit make his coverage both exciting and deeply engaging for readers and listeners alike.

name: Moriba
newsAbout: Moriba brings a thoughtful and analytical touch to sports journalism. His detailed insights and global perspective help audiences appreciate the strategy and skill behind every game.

name: Bawoh
newsAbout: Bawoh approaches global reporting with insight and maturity. Her ability to connect international issues to students’ daily lives makes her work both educational and inspiring.

name: Fanta
newsAbout: Fanta delivers world news with calm confidence and clarity. Her thoughtful storytelling helps her audience stay informed and inspired about global events that shape the world around them.

name: Augustine
newsAbout: Augustine connects the press team to the vibrant world of arts and culture. His curiosity and creative perspective help showcase the talents and traditions that make school life special.

name: Isha
newsAbout: Isha brings energy and confidence to every entertainment story she covers. Her upbeat personality and eye for talent make her reports lively, positive, and fun to follow.

name: Stellina
newsAbout: Stellina explores cultures and traditions from around the world with curiosity and respect. Her reporting celebrates diversity and encourages appreciation for global perspectives.

name: Papah
newsAbout: Papah’s love for creative writing and poetry shines through in his editorial work. His dedication to helping others express themselves makes the literary section a proud showcase of student talent.

name: William
newsAbout: William explores business and economic topics with maturity and curiosity. His thoughtful reporting encourages students to think critically about entrepreneurship and smart financial habits.

name: Daniella
newsAbout: Daniella highlights business ideas and financial achievements with clarity and enthusiasm. Her professionalism and communication skills make her a respected and admired young journalist.

name: Augusta
newsAbout: Augusta supports the media team with eagerness and commitment. Her curiosity and willingness to learn make her a dependable young member with a bright future ahead.

name: Mr. Bomah
newsAbout: Mr. Bomah is the heart and soul of the press team. His dedication extends far beyond the classroom, as he continues to nurture every student’s confidence and creativity. His wisdom, patience, and genuine care have shaped the team’s identity and inspired countless students to believe in their potential.
